nodes.bodyText: @Sammers21 please add $VERSION name to commit message, e.g. Add benchmark results for $VERSION
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -35,17 +35,23 @@ jobs:
       - name: Set env
         run: echo ::set-env name=RELEASE_VERSION::${GITHUB_REF:10}
       - name: Run benchmarks
+        id: run_benchmarks
         uses: artipie/benchmarks@master
         with:
           aws-access-key: '${{ secrets.PERF_AWS_ACCESS_KEY }}'
           aws-secret-key: '${{ secrets.PERF_AWS_SECRET_KEY }}'
-          adapter: 'files'
-          scenario: 'upload-files.jmx'
           version: '${{ env.RELEASE_VERSION }}'
-      - name: Publish reports
-        uses: JamesIves/github-pages-deploy-action@releases/v3
+      - name: Commit benchmark results
+        run: |
+          export REPORT=${{ steps.run_benchmarks.outputs.report }}
+          export VERSION=${{ env.RELEASE_VERSION }}
+          git checkout gh-pages
+          mkdir -p benchmarks/$VERSION
+          mv $REPORT benchmarks/$VERSION/$REPORT
+          git add benchmarks/$VERSION/$REPORT
+          git commit -m "Add benchmark results"
